name: Advisor Performance
description: This dashboard displays the performance of financial advisors, showing key metrics such as assets under management, number of assets and clients, average pipeline duration, and average time in stage.

kpis.name: Assets Under Management
kpis.description: Total assets under management for Bernelle Weatherhead (6.2M)

kpis.name: Number of Assets
kpis.description: Total number of assets managed by Bernelle Weatherhead (18)

kpis.name: Number of Clients
kpis.description: Total number of clients managed by Bernelle Weatherhead (11)

kpis.name: Average Pipeline Duration
kpis.description: Average duration of assets in the pipeline for Bernelle Weatherhead (39 days)

kpis.name: Average Time in Stage
kpis.description: Average time spent in each stage of the pipeline for Bernelle Weatherhead (7.5 days)

kpis.name: SLA Completion
kpis.description: Percentage of SLA's completed; Incomplete (15.4%), Complete (84.6%)

name: ABC Corp Finance Dashboard
description: This dashboard provides a financial overview of ABC Corp, showing key performance indicators (KPIs) such as sales, profit margin, and discounts across different segments and regions.
